ai-patthana15.21:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, and constantly preciously for him.
ai-patthana15.21:0.3_0: Taking the internal and external objects,
ai-patthana15.21:1.1_0: for one in whom the internally has no cause or condition.
ai-patthana15.21:2.1_0: for the sake of (of the Teaching) does not come to because of the cause or condition.
ai-patthana15.21:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
